name: Lonely Nights
description:
Welcome to this exciting new game on itch.io! Get ready to take on the role of a unique and one-of-a-kind main character in this 2D top shooter game. You'll be faced with the challenge of surviving in a harsh outer world where your character is the last of their kind.

In this game, you'll be battling against enemies that are food-based characters, who will stop at nothing to defeat you. But fear not! Your character comes equipped with  weapon and abilities to take them down.

As you progress through the levels, you'll encounter increasingly challenging enemies and obstacles. But with your determination and skill, you'll be able to conquer them all!

The graphics and sound effects in this game are top-notch, immersing you in a world filled with danger and excitement. The fast-paced and intense gameplay will keep you on the edge of your seat, as you battle your way to the top.

Overall, this 2D top shooter game is a thrilling and unique experience that you won't want to miss. So head over to itch.io now and gear up for an epic adventure!
